bug.title: Timestamp 0 when never exported.
bug.description:
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour 1. Create a new book. 2. Manage books...
#### Expected behaviour A message like `Never exported`.
#### Actual behaviour `Last exported: 1970-01-à1 01-00-00.0`
#### Software specifications * GnuCash Android version: 2.1.3 * System Android version: 6 * Device type: Phone.
